meanings.definition: The state or quality of being crazy.
meanings.sent1: Her constant crazinesses worried her family.
meanings.sent2: The crazinesses of the situation made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: His crazinesses at the party always brought laughter.
meanings.sent4: The crazinesses of the roller coaster ride left her breathless.
meanings.sent5: The town never forgot the crazinesses of the old mayor.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior that are irrational or unpredictable.
meanings.sent1: The crazinesses of his decisions left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with her crazinesses was always a challenge.
meanings.sent3: The cat's crazinesses with the laser pointer amused the kids.
meanings.sent4: The crazinesses of the stock market kept investors on edge.
meanings.sent5: The teacher tried to control the crazinesses in the classroom.
